title: Thanks for choosing To The Point!
disclaimer:
This is where the legal part comes in to tell people they are basically selling-off their souls just to check Twitter.\
We are joking, the legal part is [here](https://sites.google.com/site/wifitermsgeneric/) . You will receive some updates about our restaurant, but you will always be able to unsubscribe.
body:
This is the space for the **Captive Portal** instructions.\
You can use **Markdown** to add _"some accent"_ and make the text more understandable to the users.

Multiple chapters can be added and the overall length of the text is all up to you.

### Section 1

Sections with their respective title are allowed as well.
